pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: Walter J. Brown Media Archives & Peabody Awards Collection
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Audio recordings from 1976-1987 on 1/4 inch open reel.  The collection consists of "Reflections on Georgia," produced for broadcast on WUGA on old farm ways, saints and spirits, etc. Also included is audio of "Folklore in Georgia" featuring performances of local folk musicians including Howard Finster and "Bicentennial Minutes" featuring information about Georgia and UGA.
